item.title: Blockchain and Finance Thoughts
item.description: How will blockchain change financial services? Drastically saying, you don’t need any private bank, just currency. You do your own bank on local device. There is no gold, so no gold-paper. More elegant way, more independent, more certainty. Data will be stored in your device, not 3rd ones. We can make our own service with many plug-ins. Financial services like saving money, so banks have earned more money until now.

item.title: Introduction to Rust
item.description: ë³¸ ê¸€ì€ Rust ê³µì‹ë¬¸ì„œì˜ íŠœí† ë¦¬ì–¼ ë‚´ìš©ì„ ì •ë¦¬í•œ ê¸€ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. doc.rust-lang-org rust lang íŠ¹ì§• Rust programming language is fundamentally about empowerment â€œsystems-levelâ€ without taking on the customary risk of crashes or security holes, and without having to learn the fine points of a fickle toolchain. the language is designed to guide you naturally towards reliable code that is efficient in terms of speed and memory usage. introducing parallelism in Rust is a relatively low-risk operation: the compiler will catch the classical mistakes for you Rust isnâ€™t limited to low-level systems programming - CLI apps, web servers, and many other kinds of code rust lang ì‚¬ìš©ì²˜ Rust is proving to be a productive tool for collaborating among large teams of developers with varying levels of systems programming knowledge.

item.title: Heading
item.description: Introduction One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. My Heading He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. My Subheading A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame.
